subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The skier Lindsey Vonn changed her off-season fitness program to help her in the slalom, but it has paid off in the downhill and super-combined races as well.
snippet: The skier Lindsey Vonn changed her off-season fitness program to help her in the slalom, but it has paid off in the downhill and super-combined races as well.
